topic.title: New to Zero Net - Zero Me doesn't work on android with orbit (Tor)
topic.body:
I've done my best to configure my firefox settings for zeronet on android with Tor (orbit). The grant button doesn't do anything on zerome and when I click on the menu button on  zerome  it shows a blank menu.

Speaking of menu buttons the menu button on the zero me ap also doesn't work.

P.S. I tried orfox and had even less luck. Are there some javascript settings that I need to configure in about:config
